attributes.additional_details: parliament is shown or heard about on the radio and television all the time but not once have the people of the world seen a world leader meeting. Nothing should be kept "classified" as I believe we are being controlled without any say in the matter, I believe we'd be surprised about the decisions made for us without votes.
attributes.background: We should know what's going on in the world first hand, this will advance us as inderviduals and allow us to express our own thoughts and feelings. Media lies a lot, we should know the truth about how our world is being run and this is one way of exploring it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about televising such meetings would rest with the host country and local broadcasters.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to commit to webcasting all meetings between the Prime Minister and other heads of state.
